title: You might think ezreal is broken, but you havnt seen shit untill you seen this
body:
https://youtu.be/ifeiGBVsfqw
https://youtu.be/VQSDCtw6tSs
https://youtu.be/EoLqOqN3Xhc
https://youtu.be/LO-CVhlLuTg
i started this game dominating with a score of 7-2 and then i ran into this kasai one to many times even got the jump on her a few times.
The last clip is digusting, this champ pretty much 1 vs 5 our team the moment she got a pick on me or lucian. absolutely fucking busted.
Dont think leblanc or rengar has ever deleted me in .20 seconds. notice some of the clips is even through barrier/serpah shield.

replies.body:
1. why are you trying to 1v1 a kaisa with a fully stacked guinsoo that's 4 kills and 2 levels up

2. again, you're 2 levels down, 7 (SEVEN) kills down, and got assassinated by an assassin/adc hybrid champ, and you were in a VERY bad spot

3. MELEE EZREAL LMAO and 9 (NINE) kills down. it's like you went into this game with the intent of making this thread

4. she had elder drag, full build, 45 minutes of dark harvest stacks, and a fully stacked guinsoo while you were wandering around, alone, in the enemy's jungle, while losing, without vision. ***genius.***

> [{quoted}](name=KZ Engel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9PrNnwUh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-03T00:14:22.657+0000)
>
> 1. why are you trying to 1v1 a kaisa with a fully stacked guinsoo that's 4 kills and 2 levels up
> 
> 2. again, you're 2 levels down, 7 (SEVEN) kills down, and got assassinated by an assassin/adc hybrid champ, and you were in a VERY bad spot
> 
> 3. MELEE EZREAL LMAO and 9 (NINE) kills down. it's like you went into this game with the intent of making this thread
> 
> 4. she had elder drag, full build, 45 minutes of dark harvest stacks, and a fully stacked guinsoo while you were wandering around, alone, in the enemy's jungle, while losing, without vision. ***genius.***

our team played poorly with our lead we dominated all game, but not matter how many times i told our fed wu to just dive kaisa and keep me an lucian from being 1 shot well handle the rest of his team, he constantly pushed solo and tried to 1 vs 1 tryndamere an wasted his team fight winning up.
1. i got the jump on her look at her hp she is basically 1 AA away from dying but she bursted though my barrier and survived cause of her ult.
2. she landed a Q from her red buff to dragon pit so that means i was ment to instantly die seems fair
3. again got the jump on her i even had 2 soruces of shielding there an she still instantly deleted me.
4. i was on my way to elder with my team but they got picked off before i got there an when i got there i just happen to walk into a kasai an die in .2 seconds, also our team wasnt losing we was dominating actually, just they dunno how to close out the game an keep focusing wrong targets like tank zed/tryn.
A bad player getting wrecked out of position and not learning from it. Over and over.
Jesus christ, that last one was just her q and maybe one auto attack.

nah they all had her newly buffed W. look at her build. It's AP leaning, not AD leaning. With the buff to her W to nerf her passive, AP just erases when you are solo (Btw..... this Ez is bad in that he just walked right up to her with no minions nearby to soak her Q)

Lich bane also proc'd. Some 900 AP, and a {{item:3135}} .

Lots of champs erase like this when they have 900 AP and Lich bane.... {{champion:28}} for example can E > R an adc late game or E > Q without W.

She also had electrocute.

In other words, 2 Major burst procs + inherent damage on her build.

Her W was actually nerfed last patch. They increased the AP ratio by .15, but it applies 2 or 3 stacks of her passive which was nerfed far harder than that.

Mostly though it's just... this preposterously fed champion that builds pure damage deleted this other champion that built no defensive items. Huge shocker.

> [{quoted}](name=Hassohappa,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9PrNnwUh,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2018-06-04T02:05:21.274+0000)
>
> Her W was actually nerfed last patch. They increased the AP ratio by .15, but it applies 2 or 3 stacks of her passive which was nerfed far harder than that.
> 
> Mostly though it's just... this preposterously fed champion that builds pure damage deleted this other champion that built no defensive items. Huge shocker.

yea cause i turned the corner an died instantly before i could react in under .2 seconds, just cause shes fed an we are both full build doesnt mean she should instantly remove me from the game before i even see her char model.
No in that last clip the 3 second one she didn't W... just Q and auto attack.

> [{quoted}](name=Manslayer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9PrNnwUh,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-06-03T02:05:11.787+0000)
>
> No in that last clip the 3 second one she didn't W... just Q and auto attack.

i dunno i just walked into her an instantly died lol, didnt see anything but her passive.

btw this kaisa was feeding most the game, she pretty much handed me all my deaths, that aside she wasnt always fed after she got her jungle item she 1 shot me with her Q from about 40% hp after i 1 vs 1 that bad zed, kaisa is fucking op and anything that can dash 2500 range give her a massive shield and 1 shot you is busted.
Link the match history. We can't look on Op.GG because you are only level 30 unranked.....

> [{quoted}](name=Azadethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9PrNnwUh,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-03T00:54:19.540+0000)

> Link the match history. We can't look on Op.GG because you are only level 30 unranked.....

thats cause this acc is banned.
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2796060236/246840743?tab=overview
pew pew

yall havent seen tank tryndamere its so nasty its why i dont play it anymore cause it lets me forget what they did to nerf tanks and buff bruisers it honestly needs to be nerfed  but it unheard of so it prolly doesnt need to be nerfed but im never doing that again cuz im almost unkillable especially with ga and iceborn

Well ap kai sa being broken doesnt mean ezreal's any more balanced though lol.

AP kai sa was buffed way too many times and reached that point.

It's not really viable in ranked though. The build up is too costly. 

P.S. Vaunch is Plat IV and Ez is Gold I on the account he was playing on. 

This was actually a ranked game, and {{champion:145}} had Dark Harvest as well.... 

{{champion:62}} and Ez were both feeding her.

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2796060236/207554293?tab=overview

Almost ALL her damage was a combination of Lich Bane, and Nashor's, her passive, and W. 

By going AP, she got her W to give 3 plasma charges, which meant as soon as She W'd, her Lich Bane was proc'd, her Passive was ready to activate, and her Kit was ready to reset because of the {{item:3508}} .

Another thing to consider: She didn't have boots during his last video (Lich bane)

Early, she also had {{item:1414}} , which massively boosted damage, which she later sold for a Death Cap.

She only got to go there because Wu and Ez were feeding.

> [{quoted}](name=Azadethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9PrNnwUh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-06-03T01:11:07.327+0000)

>

> 
> Early, she also had {{item:1414}} , which massively boosted damage, which she later sold for a Death Cap.
> 
> She only got to go there because Wu and Ez were feeding.

dont matter how she got there, she fucking 1 vs 5 look at her team they was beyond useless. like i said my team ddnt play our advantage and i was cocky cause fed but that still dont justify being 1 vs 5ed by 1 fucking champ.

{{champion:23}} did 26.7k to objectives, and 50k damage to champs. I don't call that worthless for a Tryn.

Other than that..... Yeah. they kind of sucked. Low wards, low damage etc.... But a Tryndamere taking objectives is all a team needs to win..


Your team should have got some HP/Resist :S.
nice try ,but she is already feed in all those clips u showed,
you obviously havent seen malphite amumu double relic mejais bottom...
